docstring.long_description:
Less digits is faster (but less accurate).

Requires a CONNECT_DMM7510 block to create the connection.
docstring.short_description: Changes the number of digits for measurements for the DMM7510.

parameters.name: connection
parameters.description: The VISA address (requires the CONNECTION_DMM7510 block).

parameters.name: digits
parameters.description: Number of digits for the DMM measurements?
